nodes.text: Kheilwar wasps were a type of exotic creature with fatal stings. In 34 ABY, the cargo vessel Sketter's Quarrel was discovered dead in space after its crew were stung to death by kheilwar wasps that had escaped from a damaged shipping container on board the vessel.

The Sketter's Quarrel had been carrying a range of creatures to deliver to Regent Solculvis of the Mol'leaj system, who maintained a collection of exotics. Members of the Sector Rangers law enforcement agency investigated the vessel, and information from their file on the case was included in Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, a book authored by Police Commissioner Exantor Divo.

Kheilwar wasps were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. Kheilwars originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the short story "Murder in Slushtime," which was written by Barbara Hambly and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 14 in 1997.
